condition: [AND]([EQ](<*VALUE(Exp HS Redundant Servers)*>,Yes),[GT](<* IsNull(<*VALUE(Exp HS Quantity of Flex Station)*>,0)*>,0))
name: MZ-SQLCL4 Set3
action: <* DoNotResetAtt *><*SELECTVALUE(Experion_HS_PART_SUMMARY:MZ-SQLCL4)*><*SETATVQTY(Experion_HS_PART_SUMMARY:MZ-SQLCL4, <*Eval(2+ <*VALUE(Exp HS Quantity of Flex Station)*>)*>)*><* DoResetAtt *>
description: CXCPQ-45837: Condition - Quantity of Flex Station + 2 if Redundant Server = Yes
